put.desc: Create a new software update configuration with the name given in the URI.

params.name: softwareUpdateConfigurationName
params.desc: The name of the software update configuration to be created.

200.desc: Software update configuration with the same name and properties already exists.

default.desc: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

get.desc: Get all software update configurations for the account.

params.name: $filter
params.desc: The filter to apply on the operation.

200.desc: Return list of software update configurations.

default.desc: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.
